definition: China Association of Amusement Parks and Attractions (CAAPA)
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 You2 yi4 ji1 You2 le4 yuan2 Xie2 hui4
containing_words.word: 中国游艺机游乐园协会

definition: group of actors or acrobats at a fair/theatrical troupe

sentences.english: The funfair used to take place in the park near her house.
sentences.chinese: 游艺会过去常在她家附近的公园里举行。

sentences.english: Entertainment places in the past used to give out free tickets to customers.
sentences.chinese: 过去的游艺场都会发放红票给顾客。

sentences.english: This is such a large-scale charm Card entertainment community.
sentences.chinese: 这就是这种大型棋牌游艺社区的魅力。

sentences.english: For this year's Spring Festival, there will be a provincial gathering for entertainment.
sentences.chinese: 今年春节将举办全省规模的游艺会。

sentences.english: Do not remain standing in front of those sitting at a public game.
sentences.chinese: 在游艺场所里，不要站在坐着的观众前面。

sentences.english: Our village is holding a fete to raise money for the building of the new hall.
sentences.chinese: 我们村里准备举行游艺会，以筹募经费建造礼堂。

sentences.english: Our big ride requests queue in.
sentences.chinese: 我们的游艺机要求排队进入。

definition: the Confucian Six Arts, namely: rites or etiquette 禮|礼[li3] (禮儀|礼仪[li3 yi2]), music 樂|乐[yue3] (音樂|音乐[yin1 yue4]), archery 射[she4] (射箭[she4 jian4]), charioteering 御[yu4] (駕車|驾车[jia4 che1]), calligraphy or literacy 書|书[shu1] (識字|识字[shi2 zi4]), mathematics or reckoning 數|数[shu4] (計算|计算[ji4 suan4])/another name for the Six Classics 六經|六经[Liu4 jing1]
traditional handcrafted toy (e.g. spinning top 陀螺[tuo2 luo2], tangram 七巧板[qi1 qiao3 ban3] etc) (Tw)
ancient banquet game of throwing arrows into a pot, the winner determined by the number of arrows thrown in, and the loser required to drink as punishment
to spend one's leisure time/to idle away the time
teaching and learning/to study and impart
to view/to look at/to look sth over
